entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
